Reviews.Title: Kodak Easyshare C613 IS--Geat in any color!
Reviews.Author: M. Amagna "Suzie_Place"
Reviews.Content: Rockin' at Ground ZeroThe Kodak EasyShare C613 IS is great in any color.  This is my rugged everyday camera.  With color saturation, you can make great festive photos.  This camera is the best camera in its class, and cheaper too.  It powers up fast and all the buttons are where you want them to be.

Reviews.Title: Good pics
Reviews.Author: sonya hammonds
Reviews.Content: Camera takes good pics but batteries die very fast and didn't come with a charger. Still a good camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great for Kids
Reviews.Author: J. Thye
Reviews.Content: This camera cost just a little more than cameras marketed to kids, but works much better.  My 7-year-old loves it.  You have to buy a memory card to go with it, but just out of the package it can take 11 photos on internal memory.  You'll probably want to get a case for it too, if it is for a child.
